name: Pool 3D Pro: Online 8 Ball Billiards
description:
Pool 3D is one of the best designed pocket billiards game especially made for your iPhone and Ipad. The pool table calls you for a non-stop game of billiards and an unlimited feeling of recreation and excitement.
***Pool 3D Features***
The game comes with a set of noteworthy features like:
•Amazing 8 Ball Game
 •3 modes of Gameplay viz., Easy – Medium – Hard  •Flip around 4 Characters  
•Multiplayer via Bluetooth and Gamecenter  •In-Game Achievements for a great challenge  •Change Cam View 
•Intelligent Player AI

The Pool 3D comes with high quality iPhone retina and iPad HD graphics. The realistic 3D effects & graphics make the game come alive on your screen.
Your opinion counts! So leave us a review below and help us make the game better!
